twitch_info.title: Crimson Needle 2.5 - #22
twitch_info.description: we play most of plasmas stage my god

message.body: Heyo Mista Max how are you
I missed another 4 days and it seems I was not as lucky this time
Damn a max stream I need to finish my school work so I don't have to go to school tomorrow so that I can participate in a trans rights protest
I was too invested in playing I Wanna Maker last time and forgot I was watching
which of the secrets did you get?
Spent an entire day on a collab part that was at least released, I'm too spent.....
I swear every year you look younger
the last thing I was here for was the Lss stage I think
wow it's like actually payback for the other week
i'm assuming i've missed like 5 different secrets
Skulldude_ watched 3 consecutive streams this month and sparked a watch streak! Share your watch streak!Send a message in chat to celebrate your 3-Stream Streak.
Share your watch streak!Send a message in chat to celebrate your 1-Stream Streak.
I have 22 but I can't share
I swear you keep getting younger
daglom watched 3 consecutive streams this month and sparked a watch streak!
yes u skipped like 30% of the stage lmfao
oh nvm the skip was never patched apparently
nameless_iw watched 5 consecutive streams this month and sparked a watch streak! yippie
also how in the world did you manage to still skip it that has to be like quadruple frameperfect
how did that seem like the intended path
wow plasma you know a lot for someone who didn't make the stage
it literally shows you where to go lol
that's not too bad of a thing imo
yeah but you deviated before that point
maybe you someone could put your save back from the dev team
you missed a ton of learning moments too
youre gonna have a hard time
you cant even go back to old saves because old saves get deactivated
max, there is good news on discord
yeah i really struggled when i testplayed this, maker actually didnt nerf this save despite my recommendation
you should do the skip again to get back at him
aight max i need u to stop being goated
do the skip and don't take the save and backtrack  to the other saves
Interesting to see this part of the stage
also max, any interest in k3+?
breaking up with your gf to play k3+
is cookie clicker before or after k3+ /s
i cant wait for your next episode of hof roulette
im not og enough to remember the real scandalous ones...
theres the pushups which you shamelessly abandoned
daily pushups aren't a time commitment tho
This kinda looks like Vector that one parkour mobile game
i get my daily dose of exercise from going to uni (and back) on bike ok..
I tried to look through your videos to spot commitments and one of your videos is titled "All Game Maker Games"
all game maker games would be a wacky grind anyways, at that point why not just do all fangames
max you have no idea how much I would like you as a tester lol, I want you to play my stuff blind too much tho hahaha
all games but you have to finish all of them or no games
max realizing he now has to finish every L game ever made:
and if you want to live longer just create a game where you create games
ok but youd have to finish music 2
yes you are immortal until you finish all of them but you are forced to play every day
I think any% of flow is still misery
max someone could make flow last save 100 times in a row
if you hear of someone doing that then you go assassinate them using your immortality
max 500 million years in the future on a scorched barren lifeless earth having to keep playing just trap easy mode final boss:
ok but you're not allowed to do anything else in this hypothetical
would you do bad games first or good ones
i think you'd have to interweave them
lets say you play minimum 8 hours of games a day
even if you try not to, a divine force forces you to do so
You should be like wario instead, he doesn't die because he doesn't feel like it
i think if the condition in the would you rather is "beat all games" it does imply you need to make a conscious effort to do it and can't just leave some games unplayed
also cant believe they put this one ascension to valor
sorry but i dont have anything meaningful to say
so i will instead comment about yoo new braixen background
i dont think theres anything cn2.5 scale in there
this seems crazy difficult what was the dev thinking
cn2.5 is like cn2.5 in terms of being like cn2.5
@nameless_iw i disagree, cn2.5 is not very much like cn2.5
IS PLASMANAPKIN A VILLAIN? Answer now! (the answer is yes)
i do some villainous things sure
should have ask someone to shadow you
what you were doing was insane i never would have thought that anyone would consider that possible
max in ascension to valor day 1384 getting 10 million gates
We got Kale to make CN2.75 DLC with a Nenemashi avoidance, that's going in AtV
i should make a fangame that forces you to solve the rng crystal module
that sounds like a great idea
i might need to introduce you to ktane
its like homeopathy, the more you nerf the diagonal the harder it gets
that diagonal is nerfed by 16px so it is 16 times harder
YTA for framing this as an AITA post
everybody sucks here, obviously nobody should play maker avoidance
@Framzo do you blame the manufacturer of the weapon or the guy who shoots somebody
I guess you let him have Soulless HM to make him feel better, so not even AO
I'm going to be gone for another 4 days bye
thats a long time on this stage
i was really hoping that would be it so you doing an extra loop at the start would be in the clear vid
this save is a real low point in this stage
thanks i worked hard on that joke
obviously max knows the exact number from getting gaseous assets in cookie clicker
why does it keep playing the bits sound
if you pretend that there was no skip you can make it out to be like you are insanely good at the save
playing k3+ with mir is quite fun
oh did you jump over the wall
i was aware of the skip but the fact its still possible is funny
Coolestpip watched 5 consecutive streams this month and sparked a watch streak! 5 streak now
do you want to know what you did wrong there
you kept holding right when you were already flying left
ive seen like 10 people play it after all
thats not fair Pluto you made it after all
@PlutoTheThing why else would you say this
you are only allowed to want someone to enjoy a game if you made it
wow you really have to be frame-perfect
wait you got past the third one? i didnt look for a second
i just like saying things in terms of burger
like an easy save is an easy burger
its so funny every time that happens
ah the classic "everyone is streaming" discord call, up there with "everyone is muted/deafened"
still waiting on it to actually be crimson though
so what you're saying is that you're gonna be doing CN2.5 100% speedruns mhm
im now a highly attentive viewer
what height did you fall from
its so funny that you made it like that
There's that thing that shows you how it's done.
like you not realizing that being on the floor slows you down for the first 10 saves
but yeah you just didnt even fall on the slope with max fall speed and still made it
someone in another stream said they recognized the generic bought asset pack that I took these visuals from lmao
I wanna be the person, the new politically correct fangmae
woke IWBTG be like: IWBTTT (i wanna be the they/them)
you know i kinda took it as a compliment thinking these could be professionally made visuals :^)
same as when someone said it looks like an even shittier version of Limbo and Limbo already looks shitty
oh my god that was so close
yeah lots of people said it looks like Limbo
only one person said Limbo looks shitty and this looks like Limbo lmao, but if you hate Limbo visuals you have no taste anyway
i actually thought you were the first person who didnt comment at all on the fact that there is a corner there
but alas you went and did it
(it is nerfed, by 1px so there is no bad align)
fun fact, that last jump was possible holding all 3 directions
hey max will you be playing k3+ stage 2 at any point?
this screen is the medley pick
you dont even have to do that
like just fly into it on the way up
bro he's creating energy thats illegal
what if the jump refresher just holds a really big battery
btw the next save is a puzzle, if you wanna try to solve it without the device
imagine a rubber ball being thrown against a surface
the steeper the angle in the steeper the angle out
you figured out the hard to figure out part LUL
he is hitting his head against a wall until shit works
what kind of cancel was that lol
every time you went back to singlejumping the first bounce pad my soul splintered into numerous pieces
still gonna beat this stage like 2x faster than me lol
because people were doing the first part in an insane way
the rest you can figure out
yeah they landed on the platform while it was going down to jump left from
and not only is it insane on its own, it makes the rest of the save way harder too because it wastes a bunch of time
yeah secrethunting is all just kind of a blur with nothing memorable
so it feels like nothing happened
i mean i do too its super fun
that momentum jump is my favorite jump in the whole stage
that one is up there but this is higher
learning to get better at it is so satisfying
getting a feel for it makes it feel like you truly understand the momentum
that jump, on its own, is completely free, but someone in the middle of this save its devious
this stage freaks me out because of the code that would be required to make it real
can confirm, a lot of code
by far the hardest thing to code about this stage was actually not the momentum
yes haha it was very fun
i love the parallax on this save
im somewhat surprised that there is any vegetation here
did you just cancel your momentum lol
there are some trees in the background too :o
those are antennas, tons of them
antennas built on antennas built on antennas
where does this take place canonically?
i made up a little world for this stage, its not really part of another one ive made
i like making up little lore for everything i build, i feel like it makes it feel more coherent
like theres a small human settlement on the pillar in the bottom right, you can spot little huts built on it
theres very little life far from the ground
gets more and more dangerous the further up you go in terms of the environment, and more dangerous the lower you go in terms of the people
has this been the longest secret so far at least in time to complete
unprotected radiation exposure in the upper bounds?
looks like a damaged atmosphere type place
just crumbling insecure structures and no food or water
someone has to have built some sort of staircase
there are a few people that live that high up
the ones who live in the birdcage
oh, the one we can see from here?
yeah, its called the birdcage by the people down below
what does it even mean to be rich in this kind of world?
does that mean the kid is trespassing?
if the rich can exist, then so must property
what exactly tho the people down at the bottom have no clue
they also dont know how they can live up there at all
old technology, untainted by some sort of digital entity?
i'm rich in spirit, not in wealth bby
you dont wanna join the antenna building people, pillar people are probably your best bet
but, antenna building sounds more fun than pillars
its hard to choose only one though
pillars to get to new places
